solution_line_template: Her goal is {hours_per_day_goal} hour a day for {days_per_week_goal} days so on a weekly basis, she exercises {hours_per_day_goal}*{days_per_week_goal} = <<{hours_per_day_goal}*{days_per_week_goal}={weekly_exercise_hours}>>{weekly_exercise_hours} hours

If she works {weekly_exercise_hours} hours a week for {num_weeks} weeks then she exercises {weekly_exercise_hours}*{num_weeks} = <<{weekly_exercise_hours}*{num_weeks}={total_exercise_hours}>>{total_exercise_hours} hours in {num_weeks} weeks
